body:
@avdva I used 0 because that's what the kernel sends. There is no guarantee that C exposes to its clients the same values the kernel sends, and in this case I believe it does not. If you look in the C library shipped with OS X I believe you will find a mapping somewhere.

Or try putting a print of si_code in the signal handler in the Go runtime, write an equivalent Go program, and kill -TRAP it and see what the print says.
